title: Out of the Park Baseball 25
features: Single-player,MMO,Online PvP,Cross-Platform Multiplayer,Steam Achievements,Steam Trading Cards,Steam Workshop,In-App Purchases,Family Sharing
description: Out of the Park Baseball 25 marks a milestone - 25 years of sports gaming excellence! Officially licensed by MLB, the MLB Players Inc. and KBO, this year's Anniversary Edition puts you in charge of your favorite baseball franchise. Your team, your legacy, your dynasty. Play what the pros play!
